rows.label: qev092603_MSG0001
rows.name: Look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0001_2
rows.name: That nopopotamus of dadapon and mamapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0002
rows.name:
So they beat us here?
Guess we did take a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0003
rows.name:
I don't see anyone around, though.
Did they go off somewhere?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0004
rows.name: Dadapooooon! Mamapoooooon! Tora here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0005
rows.name: Mamapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0006
rows.name: Tora![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0007
rows.name: Um, wait. People live INSIDE those things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0008
rows.name: Did you know that, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_JNK0010
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev092603_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Mia that everyone who's anyone knows that.

rows.label: qev092603_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev092603_SEL0021
rows.name:
Say that you had no idea
...and that it's kind of horrifying.

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0009_m
rows.name: Oh, please. You're such a show-off. Also full of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0009_f
rows.name: Oh, please. You're such a show-off. Also full of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0011
rows.name: Oh my gosh, RIGHT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm gonna be describing this moment
to a therapist at some point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0013
rows.name: What a nightmare...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0014
rows.name: Where is Dadapon? Not with Mamapon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, right. Bad news. Terrible news![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0016
rows.name:
Giant bird chased after Dadato!
Dadato ran, but bird catch him and carry him off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0017
rows.name: That IS terrible news! No, worse than terrible. VERY terrible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0018
rows.name:
Mamara not sure what to do except
run away from reality for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0019
rows.name: But now Mamara STILL not know what to do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0020
rows.name:
Mamapon should calm down.
Friends of Tora will rescue Dadapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0021
rows.name: No time for lengthy begging. Go and save Dadapon! Please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092603_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to rescue Tora's father.

rows.label: qev092603_JNK0040
rows.name: Bargain

rows.label: qev092603_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Tora you'll rescue his father for a price.

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0022
rows.name: Tora knew best BLADEs in world would go![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0023_m
rows.name:
That extortion!
...Hmm, friend better at business than Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0023_f
rows.name:
That extortion!
...Hmm, friend better at business than Tora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, take pity on the poor guy and just help his dad already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0025
rows.name: Friend very kind. Tora throw in additional keppo carrot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0026
rows.name: Okay, now I'm regretting this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0027
rows.name: Fine, sit tight. We'll be back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0028
rows.name: Thank you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0029
rows.name: Please save Dadato before he winds up in belly of stupid bird![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0038
rows.name:
Dadato went to get giant bird egg as present for Tora
to take home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0039
rows.name:
But instead, Dadato get taken home to nest of birds in
Floating Reef![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092603_MSG0040
rows.name:
Please save Dadato before he winds up in belly of
stupid bird![ST:wait ]
